fields.name: Cosmic Fried Rice
fields.description: Golden brown fried rice that is appealing to the eye and the stomach.
fields.effect: Heals a single ally by 24% of their Max HP plus 300 extra HP.

fields.name: Trick Snack
fields.description: Eat a handful of them,and they'll launch themselves to the roof of your mouth like popping candy.
fields.effect: Recovers 2 TP for the entire team.

fields.name: Immortal's Delight
fields.description: An extremely unhealthy drink, but when you drink it, you will have a mysterious smile on your face.
fields.effect: ATK of all allies increases by 14% plus an extra 230 for the next battle.

fields.name: Mung Bean Soda
fields.description: Made from fermented legume-based products. It smells sour and pungent, but tastes cool and refreshing.
fields.effect: ATK of all allies increases by 5% plus an extra 170 for the next battle.

fields.name: Health Detox Pill
fields.description: An all-purpose antidote that can neutralize the majority of toxic substances entering the human body.
fields.effect: All allies are immune to debuffs for 3 turns for the next battle.
